metadata.title: CVE-2021-47307 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cifs: prevent NULL deref in cifs_compose_mount_options()The optional @ref parameter might contain an NULL node_name, soprevent dereferencing it in cifs_compose_mount_options().Addresses-Coverity: 1476408 ("Explicit null dereferenced")

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
